sentence.Network_en: Investors and currency dealers were caught completely unawares by the Bundesbank's action.
sentence.Network_cn: 投资者和外汇交易商被德意志联邦银行的这一举措打了个措手不及。

sentence.Network_en: Sometimes our expectations sneak up on us unawares.
sentence.Network_cn: 有些时候，我们期待的事情会不期而至。

sentence.Network_en: The camera had caught her unawares .
sentence.Network_cn: 她毫无防备地被拍摄下来。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(U1)|无忧教育 ... unaware 不知道的 unawares 不料 unbacked 无靠背的.
猛字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 猛乍〖 suddenly〗 猛不防〖 unawares;unexpectedly〗 猛打〖 smite〗.
冷字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 冷兵器〖 coldsteel〗 冷不防〖 suddenly;unawares;beoffguard;bysurprise〗 冷菜〖 colddish〗.
英语词汇的奥秘 ... besides 此外，而且 unawares 不知不觉地 nowadays 现今，当今.

... many a little makes a mickle 集腋成裘 entertain an angel unawares 有眼不识泰山 spend money like water 挥金如土.

entry.def: If something catches you unawares or takes you unawares, it happens when you are not expecting it.

example.ex: Investors and currency dealers were caught completely unawares by the Bundesbank's action...
example.tran: 投资者和外汇交易商被德意志联邦银行的这一举措打了个措手不及。

example.ex: The suspect was taken unawares, without the chance to dispose of the evidence.
example.tran: 嫌疑人被弄了个措手不及，根本来不及销毁证据。

sentences.sentence: "sorrow comes to all, and to the young it comes with bittered agony because it takes them unawares"- A.Lincoln

auth_sentence.content: So great a master having fallen unawares into an error.
auth_sentence.res_content: So great a master having fallen unawares into an error.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So great a master having fallen unawares into an error.

auth_sentence.content: The credit troubles took the Fed unawares.
auth_sentence.res_content: The credit troubles took the Fed unawares.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The credit troubles took the Fed unawares.

auth_sentence.content: Mr. Myers is being careful not to get taken unawares again.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mr. Myers is being careful not to get taken unawares again.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mr. Myers is being careful not to get taken unawares again.

means.word_mean: 出其不意地;意外地;突然地

sentences.en: The enemy came on us unawares.
She probably dropped the parcel unawares.
sentences.cn: 她很可能无意中丢失了那包裹。

means.word_mean: 使某人措手不及；出其不意；令人惊讶

sentences.en: Her sudden refusal took me unawares.
sentences.cn: 她突然拒绝，出乎我的意料。

sentences.en: You caught us unawares by coming so early.
sentences.cn: 你这么早就来了，真没想到。
